page.title: 02Geography of the area
page.content: In Loughton 10% of the population are unemployed. Most of the{jobs}available are in shops or services and a large number of the population commute to London. The total{population}of Loughton is almost 19 thousand and of these 40% are in the dependant age group. With an area of 1011 hectares, the average density is 19 people per hectare. Half of the{landscape}of the Loughton area is built up and half is protected forest. Industry and housing are built right up to the forest boundaries.With pressure of transport and the public, the forest is being slowly eroded. The{housing}is very mixed, mainly private, the dominant type being semi- detached. There are a number of new estates and a few large detached areas. There is one large council housing estate but very few flats.
